column4: how do i configure my kernel to enable ALSA and ICH based modem support?
have you changed the permisions of the file in question chmod 644 .dmrc
yeah i have, but the error message still comes up
btw wich program uses this conf file
mine is 600. try chmod 600 .dmrc; chown user:user .dmrc
ok i'll try that, back in a min, the error message does have a spelling mistake in, so its possible they messed that up too
:( i do not know what to do nest then
it says System startup links for /etc/init.d/gdm already exist. will it have done anything?
then it is not a problem of startup scripts for some reason gdm won't start
check the config of gdm and the logs
